content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
ALTER VIEW dailycost as (
SELECT
    DISTINCT * , RIGHT( InstanceId, CHARINDEX( '/', REVERSE( InstanceId ) ) - 1 ) [Resource]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sac7a.dfs.core.windows.net/conc7a/CostManagement/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
)
